Flub.Name: Real Scale
Flub.Description: Use the scale defined in the terrain. Disable to access addtional options and modify the snow's physics.

Flub.Name: Slip-off angle
Flub.Description: Angle at which snow will stick to the surface.

Flub.Name: Adhered snow mass
Flub.Description: Mass of snow that sticks to the surface.

Flub.Name: Soft Mask
Flub.Description: Mask of the snow coverage with soft falloff.

Flub.Name: Hard Mask
Flub.Description: Mask of the snow coverage with hard, precise edges.

Flub.Name: Use Snowfall mask
Flub.Description: Use incoming snowfall mask, if plugged into the Snowfall port.

Flub.Name: Use Melt mask
Flub.Description: Use incoming melt mask, if plugged into the Melt port.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
